definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: In the Indonesia it is served warm with palm sugar syrup that has been flavored with pandanus leaves and ginger.
sentences.chinese: 印尼的豆花会加棕榈树糖浆，用露兜树叶和生姜调味。

sentences.english: In the North, it is served with sugar, jasmine.
sentences.chinese: 就只有湖北家的豆花是放糖的。

sentences.english: Seven treasures ashamedly smile, because the bean curd pudding says of the little morsel is right.
sentences.chinese: 七宝不好意思的笑笑，因为豆花说的一点儿没错。

sentences.english: My friend Sammi used to be a total zit face, but now she"s got great skin."
sentences.chinese: 我朋友沙弥以前满脸豆花，但是她现在皮肤很好。

sentences.english: Douhua is served with sugar and only sugar in Hubei.
sentences.chinese: 就只有湖北家的豆花是放糖的。

sentences.english: Of bean flowers I speak not, because they are field flowers.
sentences.chinese: 关于豆花我不想说什么，因为他们是田间的花。

definition: Sichuan noodles with a spicy and numbing sauce
mapo tofu/stir-fried beancurd in chili sauce
rice noodle roll, a roll made from sheets of rice flour dough, steamed and stuffed with meat, vegetables etc
duck's blood and beef tripe in spicy soup
